scripts.test: lerna run --stream test # ⚠️  tichu-web will run tests in watch mode when not on CI
scripts.term-client: lerna run --ignore tichu-web build && cd packages/tichu-term-client && npm run start
scripts.web: lerna run --ignore tichu-term-client build && cd packages/tichu-web && npm run start
scripts.web-storybook: lerna run --ignore tichu-term-client build && cd packages/tichu-web && npm run storybook
scripts.prettier-check-all: prettier --check . # not using lerna here so we also check the root
scripts.prettier-fix-all: prettier --write . # not using lerna here so we also check the root
